text: Ron Hovey (25 August 1932 - 6 January 2015) was an Australian rules footballer. He played with Geelong in the Victorian Football League (VFL) from 1951 until 1960. He later served as the President of Geelong Football Club from 1988 until 1998. Two of his brothers, Ced and Jim, also played league football for Geelong. Hovey died on 6 January 2015 at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers Category:Order of Australia
title: Ron Hovey
